description: Situated within the Rogers Stirk Harbour + Partners designed buildings at IQL, Workable is a new approach to flexible working in Stratford that combines panoramic views over London with stylish interior design.

factsheet.heading: Welcome to Workable
paragraphs: Situated within the Rogers Stirk Harbour + Partners designed buildings at IQL, Workable is a new approach to flexible working in Stratford that combines panoramic views over London with stylish interior design.

Members at Workable have access to a friendly, vibrant, and inspiring space, with a programme of events that brings local partners and the wider community into the space, for mutual sharing of ideas and personal and professional development.
At the heart of the space, Change Please, the social enterprise helping homeless people across London, provides fantastic coffee for members and guests.

factsheet.heading: About IQL
paragraphs: Lendlease are delivering International Quarter London (IQL), a £2.8bn development situated in the heart of Stratford. Set for completion in 2029, Lendlease will have built 2.6m sqft of quality office space, c.680 homes and new community facilities. In addition to providing workplaces fit for the future, IQL will neighbour East Bank, a collection of world-leading cultural institutions. The development is surrounded by 560 acres of parkland, has excellent transport connectivity and a diverse retail offering.

With the vision to create London’s new home for progressive businesses, IQL benefits from an abundance of green space and fresh air, access to some of the world’s most forward-thinking cultural institutions, unrivalled transport connectivity and a workplace design that has employee wellbeing at its heart.
Progress is well underway with the first two residential towers designed by Allies and Morrison now complete and more than one million sq. ft. of office space already pre-let. 
Rogers Stirk Harbour + Partners have designed three commercial buildings, with Transport for London fully occupying one at 5 Endeavour Square, the Financial Conduct Authority and Unicef UK taking space in a second, and a third is occupied by Cancer Research UK and British Council.

name: Workable
